io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.render

Interface Renderer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GL11Renderer, SlickRenderer

    public interface Renderer
    An interface representing a renderer.
    Author:
    Tomaso2468

                    float x,

        Renders a texture.
        Parameters:
        img - The texture to render.
        x - The X position of the texture.
        y - The Y position of the texture.
        w - The width of the texture.
        h - The height of the texture.

                   float x,
                   float y,
                   float w,
                   float h,
                   float hshear,
                   float vshear)
        Renders a texture sheared.
        Parameters:
        img - The texture to render.
        x - The X position of the texture.
        y - The Y position of the texture.
        w - The width of the texture.
        h - The height of the texture.
        hshear - The horizontal shear.
        vshear - The vertical shear.

               float y)
        Translates the render.
        Parameters:
        g - The graphics object.
        x - The X translation.
        y - The Y translation.
